tool_description:
This is a fast scraper Yelp API, which gives real-time data from yelp.com;
Ip Rotation; Occasional Changes are handled- backend
name: Yelp Business API
title: Yelp Business API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search any business type in any location. Ex. Coffee Shop, New York

api_list.name: Each Business Scrape By URL
api_list.description:
Scrape By Yelp URL. Ex. https://www.yelp.com/biz/capital-blossom-day-spa-washington

You can get these business urls from the "/search" endpoint('YelpURL')
